roleset.name: to rent property one holds by lease to another
roleset.note: SUBLET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'sublet' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from sublet.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: [WPP , which [*T*-1] assumes financial control of its businesses in a hands-on way ,]-2 instituted a new financial system and plans [*-2] to sublet some floors in Ogilvy 's new headquarters building to outsiders .
example.arg: some floors in Ogilvy 's new headquarters building
